At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices X creatures, where X is your LV.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The demon that comes when you call its name.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant permanent
When this Aura enters, draw two cards.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has “Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.”

S[i]chadenfreude – [/i]Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
{R}, {T}: This artifact deals 1 damage to target creature you control.

Affinity for Food and Spiders [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Food and Spider you control.)[/i]
Reach
Noncreature foods you control are 2/1 Spider creatures in addition to their other types, and they have reach.
Draw a card for each kind of counter among permanents you control.

Enchant creature
...[i]It's Still You. – [/i]Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature and token you control.
Whenever a legendary creature you control enters or attacks, create a 2/2 green Citizen creature token.

Choose two: 
• Return target nonland, noncreature permanent to its owner's hand.
• Counter target creature spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
• You draw a card and lose 1 life.

Menace
Whenever Mettaton deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. If it's a land card, Mettaton deals 3 damage to defending player. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
Whenever you cast a spell you don't own, draw cards equal to its mana value.

Judgment. [i](Your LV starts at 1. It increases whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent or a creature an opponent controls dies.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, if your LV is 9 or higher, Queen Alphys deals 4 damage to each opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I really should have killed you when I had the chance.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever Chara attacks, they deal 3 damage to target Human. [i](If Chara is the only Human on the battlefield, they will deal damage to themself.)[/i]
{5}: Chara attacks this turn if able. Any player may activate this ability.
Mill four cards. If a creature card was milled this way, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If a noncreature, nonland card was milled this way, draw a card.
